description: There's some checking for '_is_precooked' left from the Zones code (pre-Cells) that need removed.  Needs to happen before using unified-objects everywhere.
title: _is_precooked checks still exist on instances

comments.content: There's some checking for '_is_precooked' left from the Zones code (pre-Cells) that need removed.  Needs to happen before using unified-objects everywhere.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbehrens

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/33375
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/178e48e0ea78c4906e8f70a6567064eb4272a599
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 178e48e0ea78c4906e8f70a6567064eb4272a599
Author: Chris Behrens <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Jun 17 23:42:42 2013 +0000

    Remove _is_precooked pre-cells Zones hacks
    
    pre-Cells Zones used to talk to child zones via the API and thus things
    didn't need to be re-serialized for API responses.  The hacks for this
    were left around and should be removed.
    
    Fixes bug 1192006
    
    Change-Id: I0b0c7fcad49412659d97037fc3cc8594b46668f1
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
